languages.text: {n}Женщина грациозно вздымает руку и указывает на вас острым когтем.{/n} "Дети жатвы, уничтожьте еретиков! Во славу Предка!"
{n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Sire!"
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина грациозно вздымает руку и указывает на вас острым когтем.{/n} "Дети жатвы, уничтожьте еретиков! Во славу Предка!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Ancestor!"
{n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Ancestor!"
{n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Ancestor!"
{n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Ancestor!"
{n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Sire!"
{n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Sire!"

languages.text: {n}La mujer levanta la mano con elegancia y te apunta con una afilada garra.{/n} «¡Hijos de la Siega, matad a los herejes! ¡Gloria al Progenitor!».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Sire!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer levanta la mano con elegancia y te apunta con una afilada garra.{/n} «¡Hijos de la Siega, matad a los herejes! ¡Gloria al Abuelo!».

languages.text: {n}女は優雅に手を上げ、鋭い爪をこちらに向ける。{/n}「刈り取りの子供たちよ、異端者を殺せ！サイアーに栄光あれ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Sire!"

traits.locale_text: {n}女は優雅に手を上げ、鋭い爪をこちらに向ける。{/n}「刈り取りの子供たちよ、異端者を殺せ！グランドファーザーに栄光あれ！」

languages.text: {n}女人优雅地举起一只手，用锋利的爪子指着你。{/n}“收割的子嗣啊，杀死这些异端分子！荣耀归于族长！”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Sire!"

traits.locale_text: {n}女人优雅地举起一只手，用锋利的爪子指着你。{/n}“收割的子嗣啊，杀死这些异端分子！荣耀归于祖父！”

languages.text: {n}Die Frau hebt elegant die Hand und deutet mit einer scharfen Klaue auf dich.{/n} "Kinder der Ernte, tötet die Ketzer! Der Schöpfer sei gepriesen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Sire!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau hebt elegant die Hand und deutet mit einer scharfen Klaue auf dich.{/n} "Kinder der Ernte, tötet die Ketzer! Großvater sei gepriesen!"

languages.text: {n}D'un geste gracieux, la femme lève la main et pointe une griffe acérée vers vous.{/n} « Enfants de la Moisson, tuez les hérétiques ! Gloire au Sire ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Sire!"

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un geste gracieux, la femme lève la main et pointe une griffe acérée vers vous.{/n} « Enfants de la Moisson, tuez les hérétiques ! Gloire à notre Père ! »

languages.text: {n}Kadın, elini zarifçe kaldırıp keskin pençesini sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Hasat'ın çocukları, kâfirleri öldürün! Efendi çok yaşa!"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman gracefully raises her hand and points a sharp claw at you.{/n} "Children of the Reaping, kill the heretics! Glory to the Sire!"
